txt_en: When you undervalue what you do, the world will undervalue who you are.
txt_cn: 当你低估自己所做的事情时，世界同时也会低估你的价值。

txt_en: The man who has made up his mind to win will never say "impossible".
txt_cn: 决心取得胜利的人从来不说“不可能”。

txt_en: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
txt_cn: 如果你想振奋自己， 先振奋周遭的人。

txt_en: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
txt_cn: 你无法打败那位永不放弃的人。

txt_en: Develop your imagination – you can use it to create in your mind what you hope to create in your life.
txt_cn: 发展你的想像力 – 你可以用它在心里创造你想在现实生活创造的东西。

txt_en: One always has enough time, if one will apply it well.
txt_cn: 人总是有足够的时间，如果他好好利用。

txt_en: Leadership belongs to those who take it.
txt_cn: 领导权属于那些想获取它的人。
